column4: hello people. new to linux. have ubuntu with gnome. want to try xfce. is it safe to install xfce? what would happen to my programs already installed for gnome? could i be able to still run them same way as gnome could run kde apps? noone replies in xubuntu channel :(
it should be safe to install
the projects I work with either use svn, hg/mercurial, or bzr/bazaar
carpii thanks. ljl yep. will do
